description: Get a list of thumbnails limited to n elements

parameters.name: container_id
parameters.description: Container id: show or dashboard id for example

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the amout of thumbnails returned

response_fields.name: thumbnails
response_fields.description: Thumbnails for the elements in given container

response_fields.name: is_recently_updated
response_fields.description: Boolean. True when resource was updated

requests.curl:
curl "www.beta-malimartv.elasticbeanstalk.com/thumbnails?container=Documentary_and_Education_CF&limit=1" -X GET \
	-H "Api-Version: v1" \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJ3d3cuYmV0YS1tYWxpbWFydHYuZWxhc3RpY2JlYW5zdGFsay5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE1OTE1Njc2ODkuNzI2NTk5NSwidXNlciI6eyJpZCI6MSwibG9naW4iOiJkb2N0b3IyMjkud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwiZW1haWwiOiJkb2N0b3IyMjkud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwib3JpZ2luIjoibG9jYWwiLCJwcmVtaXVtIjpmYWxzZX0sImV4cCI6MTU5MTY1NDA4OX0.LKnvHe2m_Llf_8VJUdSTrI2xYdyWT1HF8x9Wf0RIu41qrFgadWSptuT0cX8iJEk3VwQi26Db6PYBwbDxduOLNw"
